图形学算法

Aug 8, 2015

  1. 判断点是否在矩形内

    bool IsPointInRect(const Rect& rc, const Point& p) { double xr = (p.x - rc.p1.x) * (p.x - rc.p2.x); double yr = (p.y - rc.p1.y) * (p.y - rc.p2.y);

return ( (xr <= 0.0) && (yr <= 0.0) ); }
